name: MinuteChat
tagline: A tiny chat application made using basic C++ for a school project.
body:
# Welcome to Minute Chat's GitHub page

### Made using C++
Beneath Minute Chat lies one of the most trusted languages - C++. You can rest assured about Minute Chat's performance and its stability.

### Works over the LAN 
Well, where else? A school project needs to run on the LAN. It uses a basic server-client topology, with the program files stored at a network location that can be accessed by all the users of the chat program. 

### Fast
Quick and light on resources. That's to be expected from a ~10kB program. Means about any computer from this century can run Minute Chat. Reading the chat files over the LAN is also not a problem, as typical chat files can be read within seconds.

### Authors and Contributors
Created by @the42guy and Mayank Jain.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
